SEARCH
Package gutek.gui.controllers.launch

Class LoginFXMLController

java.lang.Object
gutek.gui.controllers.FXMLController
gutek.gui.controllers.launch.LoginFXMLController
@Component public class LoginFXMLController extends FXMLController
Controller for the login view, handling user authentication and registration.

This view allows users to enter their login credentials, log in, register a new account, or navigate back to the language selection view.

    • LoginFXMLController

      public LoginFXMLController(MainStage stage, FXMLFileLoader fxmlFileLoader, TranslationService translationService, AppUserService appUserService)
      Constructs the `LoginFXMLController`, initializing its components.
      Parameters:
      stage - the main stage of the application
      fxmlFileLoader - utility for loading the FXML file associated with this view
      translationService - the service used for managing translations
      appUserService - the service responsible for handling user registration and login

    • handleLogin

      private void handleLogin()
      Handles the login process when the login button is clicked. Validates the user's credentials and logs them in if valid.

    • handleRegister

      private void handleRegister()
      Handles the registration process when the register button is clicked. Validates the input and registers a new user if the username is not already taken.

    • handleBack

      private void handleBack()
      Handles the action of going back to the language selection view. Navigates the user to the language selection screen.

    • initializeIcons

      private void initializeIcons()
      Initializes the icons used in the controller's UI components.

    • updateIcons

      private void updateIcons(double scaleFactor)
      Updates the size of each icon according to the given scale factor.
      Parameters:
      scaleFactor - the scale factor used to adjust the size of each icon.
